entries.journal_entry_description: You are attempting to show Blaire, the Disillusioned Ewok Festival of love Sage, that love still exists even in a galaxy at war.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Speak with Blaire, the Disillusioned Festival of Love Sage, and find out why he has fallen to the Dark Side...of Love. You find him on a beach outside of Tyrena on Corellia.
entries.task00_journal_entry_title: Speak with the Disillusioned Festival of Love Sage
entries.task00_waypoint_name: The Disillusioned Festival of Love Sage
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Speak with Mr. Love in Tyrena and find out if he can help you show Blaire that love still exists in the galaxy.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Mr. love suggested that there is no love purer than someone has for a pet. He knows a local pet lover named Carson Vance. Go speak with him.
entries.task03_item_name: You found Peaches! Send him home to Carson
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: The pet lover is distraught because his pet durni, Peaches, has gone missing. Help him find Peaches. He said that Peaches likes to play near the Shuttleports or at the bridge.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Return to Blaire, the Disillusioned Festival of Love Sage, and relate to him the love that Carson Vance has for his pet durni, Peaches.
entries.task04_waypoint_name: The Disillusioned Festival of Love Sage
entries.task06_start_message: You fire a single crossbow bolt into the air.
entries.task07_comm_message_text: Well done. Go share with Blaire the proof you've found of a man and his pet.
entries.task08_comm_message_text: There is someone who might be able to help. In Tyrena, there's a man known as Mr. Love. Find him and let him know about Blaire's problem.
